mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.price ,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover, et.name as teacherName, es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course as ec left outer join edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id=et.id left outer join edu_subject as es1 on ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id left outer join edu_subject as es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id where ec.id=#{courseId}
